<a id="VisualShaderNodeParticleEmit"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeParticleEmit

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A visual shader node that forces to emit a particle from a sub-emitter.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This node internally calls ``emit_subparticle`` shader method. It will emit a particle from the configured sub-emitter and also allows to customize how its emitted. Requires a sub-emitter assigned to the particles node with this shader.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

[EmitFlags](VisualShaderNodeParticleEmit.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeParticleEmit_EmitFlags) **EMIT_FLAG_COLOR** = `8`

[EmitFlags](VisualShaderNodeParticleEmit.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeParticleEmit_EmitFlags) **EMIT_FLAG_CUSTOM** = `16`
